      insert a new mutationlog into the database's mutation table

      boolean askForMutation()
      thing choose if he wants to mutate or not if he wants to mutate call decideMutation to select desired mutation and adds his mutation to his zone's mutationWaitingqueue with the duration and the delay if there is any
      private void bind(Capability capability)
      the MutableThing aquires a new capability and updates the thing's zoneState
      private int calculateMutationDuration(java.util.ArrayList<Capability> nextStatus)
      calculates the expected duration of a mutation
      boolean decide()
      decides if the Thing is going to respect authority decision or act in a deviant way if thing is going to respect authority decision returns true else return false
      private java.util.ArrayList<Capability> decideMutation()
      the MutableThing chooses the Mutation he wants to execute
      void executeMutation(boolean authorityResponse, java.util.ArrayList<Capability> nextStatus, Mutation mutation)
      calls decide method if MutableThing is allowed to mutate, he verifies if there's enough resources in his zone to do so if its the case he adds his mutation to the execution queue and removes it from the corresponding waitingQueue and decrements the zone common resources and he calls bind and/or unbind method at the end calls saveMutationLog method

      • askForMutation

        public boolean askForMutation()
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.sql.SQLException
        thing choose if he wants to mutate or not if he wants to mutate call decideMutation to select desired mutation and adds his mutation to his zone's mutationWaitingqueue with the duration and the delay if there is any
        Returns:
        true if MutableThing asks for mutation otherwise return false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • executeMutation

        public void executeMutation(boolean authorityResponse,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Capability> nextStatus,
                            Mutation mutation)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        calls decide method if MutableThing is allowed to mutate, he verifies if there's enough resources in his zone to do so if its the case he adds his mutation to the execution queue and removes it from the corresponding waitingQueue and decrements the zone common resources and he calls bind and/or unbind method at the end calls saveMutationLog method
        Parameters:
        authorityResponse -
        nextStatus -
        mutation -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
